cab.content: (P 4-77(3) From Secretary of Slate to Viceroy, Foreign Department,2()lh August 1919.Priority A. Clear the line.Foreign Secret. Afghanistan. Please report what action yon are taking to demarcate frontier under Article 5 of recent agreement and lines on which you propose that demarcation should proceed. Press reports MalTey appointed boundary Commissioner, and your Army Department telegram No. 11575, says operations began on 23rd. You will, of course, submit proposals of Commission and your recommendations for approval of His Majesty's Government before taking any action on them.
